title: Taking a SRS of Student Council Members
question_text: A state convention for student council members has been announced.  Washington High School is allowed to send 5 students and the advisor has decided to select a SRS  of interested student council members in order to determine who will represent their school at the state convention. Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved. Each of the 25 students who expressed interest in attending the state convention was assigned a unique numerical code as shown above. If the random digits provided are used to select the SRS, which of the following students will NOT be included in the SRS?
